Privacy Policy

Participation

By registering for and/or participating in Hack River Dell, you may be required to provide the following information:

  • Your name and address
  • Contact information, including telephone number and e-mail address
  • Additional personal information, including but not limited to your birthdate, school name and location.

In addition, by registering for and/or participating, you agree to the terms of the MLH Contest Terms and Conditions and the MLH Privacy Policy. Please note that you may receive pre and post-event informational e-mails and occasional messages about hackathons from MLH and their partners as per the MLH Privacy Policy.

Data Collection

We also collect data that helps us to better understand user behavior and improve our website and event. Using Google Analytics, the data that we collect may not, on its own, result in direct association to any specific individual. Rather, the data we collect helps us understand, on a broad scale, who our audience is. Examples of the types of data we collect include, but are not limited to:

  • Language, zip code, area code, location, and time zone
  • Unique device identifier, operating system, and user agent information

For more information about data collection, please be sure to look over the event waiver.
